body:
This is quite high priority given the current Shield queue. 58 seems like the right target to me. 

As @mythmon mentioned above, we're localizing the content on the about:studies page and the single preference that we inject into about:preferences only. This gives users visibility into any studies they may currently be participating in and allows them to opt-out of the program altogether without disabling telemetry. 

Individual studies will require localization. We currently have each experimenter handle localization on their own, but it would be good for us to establish a more formal process soon.
